body_html:
I get similar behavior with conda:


>>> import torch
>>> import torch.nn.functional as F
>>> X = torch.rand(3)
>>> X

 0.3665
 0.1220
 0.4375
[torch.FloatTensor of size 3]

>>> F.relu(X)

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/kedzie/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/functional.py", line 463, in relu
    return _functions.thnn.Threshold.apply(input, 0, 0, inplace)
  File "/home/kedzie/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/_functions/thnn/auto.py", line 126, in forward
    ctx._backend = type2backend[type(input)]
  File "/home/kedzie/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_thnn/__init__.py", line 15, in __getitem__
    return self.backends[name].load()
  File "/home/kedzie/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_thnn/__init__.py", line 38, in load
    self.functions, self.mixins)
  File "/home/kedzie/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_thnn/utils.py", line 105, in load_backend
    lib_handle = importlib.import_module(lib)
  File "/home/kedzie/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/importlib/__init__.py", line 126, in import_module
    return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level)
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 994, in _gcd_import
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 971, in _find_and_load
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 955, in _find_and_load_unlocked
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 658, in _load_unlocked
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 571, in module_from_spec
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap_external>", line 922, in create_module
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 219, in _call_with_frames_removed
ImportError: /home/kedzie/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_thnn/_THNN.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: undefined symbol: _ZTVN10__cxxabiv120__si_class_type_infoE

body:
I get similar behavior with conda:

```

>>> import torch
>>> import torch.nn.functional as F
>>> X = torch.rand(3)
>>> X

 0.3665
 0.1220
 0.4375
[torch.FloatTensor of size 3]

>>> F.relu(X)

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/kedzie/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/functional.py", line 463, in relu
    return _functions.thnn.Threshold.apply(input, 0, 0, inplace)
  File "/home/kedzie/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/nn/_functions/thnn/auto.py", line 126, in forward
    ctx._backend = type2backend[type(input)]
  File "/home/kedzie/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_thnn/__init__.py", line 15, in __getitem__
    return self.backends[name].load()
  File "/home/kedzie/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_thnn/__init__.py", line 38, in load
    self.functions, self.mixins)
  File "/home/kedzie/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_thnn/utils.py", line 105, in load_backend
    lib_handle = importlib.import_module(lib)
  File "/home/kedzie/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/importlib/__init__.py", line 126, in import_module
    return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level)
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 994, in _gcd_import
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 971, in _find_and_load
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 955, in _find_and_load_unlocked
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 658, in _load_unlocked
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 571, in module_from_spec
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap_external>", line 922, in create_module
  File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 219, in _call_with_frames_removed
ImportError: /home/kedzie/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_thnn/_THNN.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: undefined symbol: _ZTVN10__cxxabiv120__si_class_type_infoE
```
